sentences.en: About 8: five, Beijing Paralympic Game ceremonial fire admission, scene immediately a scence of jubilation.
sentences.cn: 八时五分许, 北京残奥会圣火入场, 现场顿时一片欢腾.

sentences.en: And then I remember his voice over the telephone, that strange mixture of fright and jubilation.
sentences.cn: 接着我又想起他在电话上的声音—又恐惧又开心的古怪调子.

sentences.en: Beijing is applied the Olympic Games gained a success 2008, do it jubilation.
sentences.cn: 北京申办2008年奥运会取得成功, 举国上下为之欢腾.

sentences.en: Berlusconi submitted his resignation on Saturday as the nation grappled with a major debt crisis, to scenes of jubilation among thousands of people in the streets of Rome.
sentences.cn: 贝卢斯科尼于上周六辞职，成千上万罗马民众走上街头庆祝。意大利近日深陷大规模债务危机。

sentences.en: During the joyous Spring Festival, the whole world joins in the jubilation.
sentences.cn: 新春佳节, 普天同庆.

sentences.en: I was thinking about what Roggie had said with increasing jubilation.
sentences.cn: 我掂量着列杰刚才说过的话,心里越来越感到欢乐.

sentences.en: In Madrid there was open jubilation.
My colleagues read the communique with astonishment rather than jubilation.
sentences.cn: 同事们读了公报,只感惊奇,而非欣喜.

sentences.en: The end of the year's family installs, decorates the market, the jubilation is a subject absolutely.
sentences.cn: 年底的家装 、 装饰市场, 喜庆绝对是主题.

sentences.en: The goal was greeted by jubilation from the home fans.
The new school year, new semester, we all filled with the campus an atmosphere of jubilation.
sentences.cn: 新学年, 新学期, 我们的校园处处洋溢着喜庆的气氛.

sentences.en: The soft lighting was hit in the face, a jubilation.
sentences.cn: 柔和的灯光打在人们脸上, 一片喜气洋洋.

sentences.en: The whole city was a scene of jubilation.
The whole Divine Land was a scene of jubilation.
There was jubilation that a local team had come first.
sentences.cn: 当地一支球队名列第一，因此到处洋溢着欢乐的气氛。

sentences.en: When Wayne Rooney equalized on the hour there was only jubilation.
sentences.cn: 当鲁尼打进扮平比分的进球时,场内有的只是一片欢腾.

sentences.en: Why Do People Perform Lion and Dragon Dances on Days of Jubilation?
sentences.cn: 为什么在喜庆的日子里要舞狮、舞龙?
